Room.Name: Goblin Shrine Entrance
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing at the entrance to a goblin underground shrine.
Room.LongDescription: Ahead of you lies a wide, long torch lit tunnel leading into the goblin shrine. You hear wails and shrieks coming from the tunnel in front of you. Inscribed on the western wall is the warning: "All unbelievers will answer to Byhtme, the high priest of Maglubyet." You ponder the question if your decision to come here was such a good idea. c
